title: Disney's Fairy Tale Weddings
resume: A behind-the-scenes look at weddings and one-of-a-kind engagements that take place at Disney Destinations around the globe, including Walt Disney World, Disneyland and Disney Cruise Lines. Hosted by Ben Higgins and Lauren Bushnell. Included: fashion; products; entertainment; and décor. Also: a surprise musical performance by Pentatonix.
